#  [Radio: The ISSPOL Scandal](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5VtO5wP5FGQ)

*September 2020*

- In this radio feature, I speak with some of my USFQ School of Economics professors at a local radio station program about a recent corruption scandal in the country and the specific implications of a [journal article's](https://papers.ssrn.com/sol3/papers.cfm?abstract_id=3237456) empirical findings about corruption.
